nodes.text: Calla was a human, female from the planet Naboo, who went to Canto Bight as a tourist, but soon lost all her money and, unable to leave, took a job as a hotel receptionist. Later she became the Grammus sister's servant after she lost a gamble against Rhomby Grammus. She helped the sisters do a business deal with Derla Pidys, and afterwards got a new job in another hotel thanks by the sisters.
